::: {.content-card}
### [Field Site Name] - [Year]

Add photos from your field work expeditions. Include images of research sites, data collection, and the natural environment you study.

**To add images, use this syntax:**
```markdown
![Image caption](images/fieldwork-photo.jpg)
```

Or use HTML for more control:
```html
<img src="images/photo.jpg" alt="Description" width="600" style="border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
```
:::
